titles.title: Expressing support for the goals of "World Sight Day" by promoting the importance of accessible, affordable, and inclusive eye care.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the goals and ideals of World Sight Day.
